function.name: suctionPower-setValue
function.description: This function is used to change the suction intensity of a SmartThings device.

location.description: The location where the device is located.

room.description: The room where the device is located.

device.description: The name or type of the device to change the suction intensity.

predefinedSuctionPowerMode.description: The predefined suction power mode to set on the device.
